  • Uses of MediaPackage in org.opencastproject.mediapackage.selector

    Methods in org.opencastproject.mediapackage.selector with parameters of type MediaPackage
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Collection<T>
    AbstractMediaPackageElementSelector.select(MediaPackage mediaPackage, boolean withTagsAndFlavors)
    This base implementation will return those media package elements that match the type specified as the type parameter to the class and that flavor (if specified) AND at least one of the tags (if specified) match.
    Collection<T>
    AbstractMediaPackageElementSelector.select(MediaPackage mediaPackage, String publicationChannel, boolean withTagsAndFlavors)
    Similar to above, but will get media package elements from the given publication instead.
